channel.title: Sports News
channel.description: Sport is an activity that is governed by a set of rules or customs and often engaged in competitively. Sports commonly refer to activities where the physical capabilities of the competitor are the sole or primary determinant of the outcome (winning or losing)

item.title: Dhoni suffers injury during practice
item.description: Indian captain MS Dhoni has injured himself while batting during a nets session in Vadodara, but is likely to feature in the first match of the seven-ODI series against Australia on Sunday

item.title: Oudin: The Future of American Tennis?
item.description: 17-Year-Old Georgian Has Notched Three Upsets at the U.S. Open; Will She Take the Mantle from Venus and Serena Williams?

item.title: Bengal slide to third straight defeat
item.description:
East Zone
Jharkhand ended Assam's unbeaten run and continued their own at the Tata Digwadih Stadium in Dhanbad

item.title: A test of the one-day format's popularity
item.description:
Gary Kirsten speaks to Sachin Tendulkar during a net session, Mumbai, October 23, 2009 Sachin Tendulkar will complete 20 years on the international circuit during the series against Australia Â© Associated Press Related Links Players/Officials: Michael Clarke | Shaun Marsh | Virender Sehwag | Yuvraj Singh Series/Tournaments: Australia tour of India Teams: Australia | India
One-day international cricket in India is an anomaly. While the world - including players like Ricky Ponting and Sachin Tendulkar - seems sated with the 50-over game

item.title: Lawson scores 29 points in Nuggets' win
item.description: Ty Lawson scores 29 points to help Nuggets beat Lakers 119-105 in preseason finale
